com.facebook.buck.rules

Interface SourcePath

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<SourcePath>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BuildRuleSourcePath, PathSourcePath

    public interface SourcePath
extends Comparable<SourcePath>
    Represents a source that is required to build a rule (typically a file).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object asReference() 
      Path resolve()
      Converts this SourcePath to the Path it represents.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Comparable

        compareTo

    • Method Detail

      • resolve

        Path resolve()
        Converts this SourcePath to the Path it represents. Note, this method should only be called while a rule is executing.
        Returns:
        the Path which this instance represents.

      • asReference

        Object asReference()
        Returns:
        a representation of path in a stable manner that does not involve calling {#resolve()}
